text: A Great Space Voyage () is a 1975 Soviet science fiction movie directed by Valentin Selivanov.Гостья из будущего, или Посторонним вход воспрещенБольшое космическое путешествие It stars Ludmila Berlinskaya, Sergei Obrazov, and Igor Sakharov. ==Actors== *Ludmila Berlinskaya — Sveta Ishenova *Sergei Obrazov — Fedya Druzhinin *Igor Sakharov — Sasha Ivanenko *Lyusyena Ovchinnikova — Fedya's mother *Pavel Ivanov — Egor Kalinovsky, ship commander *Ninel Myshkova — Katerina, employee of the airplane control department *Zinaida Sorochinskaya — doctor and boy's mother *Alexei Leonov — cameo == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1975 science fiction movies Category:Soviet science fiction movies
title: A Great Space Voyage
